events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as developer and software experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process for the engineering role.
The initial screening call with the candidate went well, discussing their background in software development.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in advancing to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the candidate's technical interview for next Tuesday, focusing on coding and system design.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Scheduled an HR interview to discuss company culture and the candidate's alignment with our values.
The HR interview was completed positively, with mutual interest expressed in moving forward.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate, including competitive salary and benefits for the engineering role.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm to join the team.
The candidate has officially accepted the offer, confirming their start date and excitement for the role.
Onboarding has started smoothly with all necessary equipment and resources provided to the new software engineer.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with the new engineer fully integrated into the team.
